entry.title: Installing Dropbox in Arch Linux
entry.content:
Install

From AUR you can install with:

yaourt -S dropbox dropbox-cli

Configuration

This command will show you a GUI in XWindow to configure the account:

$ dropboxd &

It will ask you if you want to run it from an unsupported location. The unsupported location is AUR instead of the pacakges of Dropbox, so, say yes.

To start syncing files in the background, use:

$ dropbox start

Once there it will start fetching files. You can see the overall status with:

$ dropbox status

And the status for a given file:

$ dropbox filestatus <path>

You may be interested in enabling the autostart:

$ dropbox autostart y

and disable the syncronisation in the local network for security reasons:

$ dropbox lansync n

For more options, take a look:

$ dropbox --help
